## Tuple.SetInner type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type SetInner<T extends Tuple, I extends number, V, S extends Tuple> = T extends readonly [infer H, ...infer R] ? I extends Size<S> ? [V, ...R] : [H, ...SetInner<R, I, V, Append<S, H>>] : T;
```
